pkgmetadata.longdescription: probablepeople is a python library for parsing unstructured romanized name or company strings into components, using conditional random fields.>From the python interpreter:>>> import probablepeople>>> probablepeople.parse('Mr George "Gob" Bluth II') [('Mr', 'PrefixMarital'), ('George', 'GivenName'), ('"Gob"', 'Nickname'), ('Bluth', 'Surname'), ('II', 'SuffixGenerational')]>>> probablepeople.parse('Sitwell Housing Inc')[('Sitwell', 'CorporationName'), ('Housing', 'CorporationName'), ('Inc', 'CorporationLegalType')]
